tool_description: Validates whether selected appliances will physically fit in the designated kitchen spaces, considering clearances, door swings, and accessibility requirements.

appliance_dimensions.description: Array of appliance dimensions as 'W x D x H' in inches

planned_locations.description: Planned installation locations for each appliance

available_spaces.description: Available space dimensions for each location

clearance_requirements.description: Required clearances in inches for each appliance

accessibility_needed.description: Whether ADA accessibility compliance is required

error_messages: Dimension mismatch: Array lengths for appliances, locations, and spaces must match
Insufficient space: One or more appliances won't fit in designated locations
Clearance violation: Required clearances cannot be maintained with current layout
Accessibility non-compliance: Layout doesn't meet ADA accessibility requirements
Invalid dimension format: Use 'Width x Depth x Height' format in inches
usage: Provide appliance dimensions and planned locations with available spaces to validate fit and clearance requirements.

fit_validation.description: Boolean array indicating whether each appliance fits

space_utilization.description: Percentage of space used by each appliance

clearance_status.description: Clearance validation status for each appliance
